text: Olympique Lyonnais is a football club which plays in France. == Name == * 1899-1950 Lyon Olympique Universitaire * 1950-present Olympique Lyonnais == League title == * Ligue 1 : 7 ** 2001/02, 2002/03, 2003/04, 2004/05, 2005/06, 2006/07, 2007/08 * Ligue 2 : 3 ** 1950/51, 1953/54, 1988/89 == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 Division 1 2nd 2001/02 Division 1 Champions 2002/03 Ligue 1 Champions 2003/04 Ligue 1 Champions 2004/05 Ligue 1 Champions 2005/06 Ligue 1 Champions 2006/07 Ligue 1 Champions 2007/08 Ligue 1 Champions 2008/09 Ligue 1 3rd 2009/10 Ligue 1 2nd 2010/11 Ligue 1 3rd 2011/12 Ligue 1 4th 2012/13 Ligue 1 3rd 2013/14 Ligue 1 5th 2014/15 Ligue 1 2nd 2015/16 Ligue 1 2nd 2016/17 Ligue 1 4th 2017/18 Ligue 1 3rd 2018/19 Ligue 1 3rd 2019/20 Ligue 1 7th 2020/21 Ligue 1 4th 2021/22 Ligue 1 8th === Former position === Category:French football clubs Category:Organizations based in Lyon Category:1899 establishments in France
title: Olympique Lyonnais
